Learn to recognize security risks earlier and communicate them effectively across teams. The training emphasizes building security conscious cultures where protective thinking becomes part of everyday design and decision making, not just compliance checkboxes.

Designed for both technical and non technical audiences, this session combines storytelling with practical lessons. Participants gain insights from post incident analysis, understanding both how failures occur and how organizations successfully recover and prevent future incidents.

services.short_desc: Protect yourself from targeted social engineering and manipulation tactics. Learn to recognize when personal relationships, social situations, and daily interactions are being exploited to sabotage your work performance and compromise critical projects.

detail_desc.content_html:

Learn how adversaries exploit relationships, social situations, and daily interactions to manipulate productivity, steal information, or sabotage critical projects.

Participants explore real world scenarios where engineers and technical professionals became targets through seemingly innocent social connections, family pressures, romantic relationships, and community interactions. Understand the psychology behind targeted manipulation and develop practical strategies to maintain security awareness without becoming paranoid or isolated.

The training combines lessons from both team dynamics and security incident analysis, showing how personal vulnerabilities connect to professional risks. Learn to recognize warning signs, establish healthy boundaries, and protect yourself while maintaining genuine relationships and work life balance.

questions.question: Are there any prerequisites for attending the training?
questions.answer: No specific prerequisites are required. The training is suitable for all levels.

services.why_buy: Your technical expertise makes you a valuable target. Adversaries know they cannot always breach systems directly, so they target you through personal relationships and social manipulation. Learn to recognize these tactics before they compromise your work, damage your reputation, or sabotage projects worth millions. Protect yourself without sacrificing genuine relationships or becoming isolated.

services.name: English Vocabulary for Software Projects Training for Turkish Speakers
services.keywords: software english vocabulary, programming vocabulary, technical english communication, international team collaboration, english for developers
services.html_desc: Learn essential English vocabulary for software projects with interactive lessons, real examples, and a study guide covering 2,222 words.
services.short_desc: Communicate confidently in global software teams by mastering essential English terms. Our training combines practical examples with guided practice, making it simple to expand your vocabulary and use it effectively in real projects.

detail_desc.title: About the Training
detail_desc.content_html:
This training is designed to help software professionals expand their English vocabulary and communicate more effectively in international projects. Instead of focusing on technical details, the course uses examples from the software world to explain English words in context, making it easier to understand both their meanings and how they are used in real life projects.

Through interactive online sessions, you will learn the meanings and correct pronunciations of new words, practice using them in sentences, and reinforce your knowledge with review exercises. By the end of four lessons, you will have learned 100 commonly used words with your instructor, and with the help of the Software English Study Guide and Review Practice Notebook, you will continue building your vocabulary up to 2,222 words.

questions.question: What materials are given to training participants?
questions.answer: Participants will receive the Software English Study Guide and Review Practice Notebook, which include Turkish translations of 2,222 words along with sample English sentences from the software field.

questions.question: How do you teach words?
questions.answer: During the course, the instructor explains English words using example sentences taken from the software world. While teaching the Turkish meaning of each word, the instructor also provides examples of how the word is used in software projects. This approach makes it easier to understand both the term itself and the context in which it is commonly used.

questions.question: Are there opportunities for practice in the training?
questions.answer: Yes, there are sections during the training where participants will practice speaking.

questions.question: Is there any homework?
questions.answer:
Yes. Our training begins with interactive sessions where you learn the meanings and correct pronunciations of new words.

Your homework between lessons is to complete the exercises in the review practice notebook. By the end of four lessons, you will have learned 100 words together with your teacher.

After this stage, you will continue building your vocabulary independently. Using the study guide and the review practice notebook, you will reach a total of 2,222 words.

questions.question: Which programming languages does this course focus on?
questions.answer:
This training does not focus on technical aspects of programming. Instead, its purpose is to expand your vocabulary so you can better understand your teammates and actively participate in business communication.

For example, consider the sentence: “In case you are adamant on using multiple inheritance, it should be done in C++.”

In our course, the word “adamant” is introduced to teach its meaning—insistent, stubborn, determined. At the same time, you may also learn that “multiple inheritance” is a concept that can be applied in C++.

However, the course does not go into technical details about how this works. The focus remains on language and communication.

questions.question: Who is this course ideal for?
questions.answer: This training is ideal for software developers working with international teams on global projects, IT professionals seeking to communicate more effectively in cross cultural meetings, individuals evaluating remote job opportunities, and contributors to open source projects who want to collaborate seamlessly across language and cultural barriers.

questions.question: What is the duration of the training?
questions.answer: The training is 16 hours in total, but it can be adjusted based on your needs.

questions.question: Are there any prerequisites for attending the training?
questions.answer: No specific prerequisites are required. The training is suitable for all levels.

services.why_buy: Global software opportunities require strong English communication. Gain the competitive edge to excel in international projects and advance your career faster. Stop feeling hesitant in meetings with global teams and become the confident communicator every international team wants.

services.name: Test Driven Development Workshop Training
services.keywords: test driven development, TDD workshop, unit testing practices, red green refactor cycle, code quality improvement, automated testing
services.html_desc: Hands on TDD workshop teaching test first development with practical exercises. Master unit, integration, and acceptance testing to maintain code quality while moving fast with AI assisted development.
services.short_desc: Master Test Driven Development through hands on practice. Learn the red green refactor cycle and testing pyramid. Protect your projects from vibe coding chaos when using AI tools by establishing disciplined testing habits that guide design decisions.

detail_desc.title: About the Workshop Training
detail_desc.content_html:
This hands on workshop teaches Test Driven Development through practical exercises with C# and JavaScript. Learn the red green refactor cycle, testing pyramid concepts, and how TDD shapes code design and development practices. Developers gain skills to write meaningful tests, choose appropriate test levels, and maintain confidence as codebases grow, especially critical when using AI assisted development tools.

The workshop follows a learn demo practice cycle. Participants learn TDD principles, watch live demonstrations, then practice through guided exercises. Working in pairs or small groups encourages knowledge sharing and collaborative problem solving.

Tools like Visual Studio Code and testing frameworks illustrate techniques that adapt to any development environment. By the end, participants confidently apply TDD practices to real projects, preventing vibe coding from destroying project quality while leveraging AI for faster development.

questions.question: Who is this course ideal for?
questions.answer: This workshop is designed for software developers, engineers, and tech leads who want to improve code quality, reduce bugs, and adopt Test Driven Development practices.

questions.question: What are the technical prerequisites?
questions.answer: Participants should have VS Code installed and basic programming experience in C# or JavaScript. Familiarity with basic testing concepts is helpful but not required.

questions.question: Do I need prior testing experience?
questions.answer: No prior testing experience is required. The workshop starts with fundamentals and progressively builds to advanced TDD techniques with plenty of practical exercises.

questions.question: What is the workshop structure?
questions.answer: The full day workshop follows three phases: theoretical TDD foundations, live instructor demonstrations with xUnit/MochaJS/Puppeteer, and hands on participant practice with guided coding tasks in VS Code.

services.why_buy: AI assisted coding accelerates development but vibe coding without tests destroys projects. Master TDD to move fast without breaking things. Write reliable code that catches issues before production. Gain the disciplined testing habits that let you leverage AI tools confidently while maintaining professional code quality and preventing regressions.

services.name: Lightweight Shopping Cart System
services.keywords: database free shopping cart, secure e-commerce, whatsapp shopping cart, instant messaging orders, gdpr compliant shopping, no customer data storage, location based delivery, privacy focused e-commerce, static shopping cart, lightweight online store
services.html_desc: Database free shopping cart system where customers send orders via WhatsApp or instant messaging. No personal data storage means automatic GDPR compliance and zero data breach risk.
services.short_desc: Accept orders securely without storing customer data. Customers create their shopping cart and send orders directly through WhatsApp or similar instant messaging apps. Since you never store personal information in a database, GDPR compliance becomes automatic and data breach liability disappears. Customers can share their location for nearby deliveries instead of typing addresses, making the checkout process faster and more convenient.

detail_desc.title: Zero Data Storage, Zero Liability
detail_desc.content_html: Traditional e-commerce platforms store customer names, addresses, phone numbers, purchase histories, and payment information in databases, creating massive legal liability under GDPR, CCPA, and similar privacy regulations. Every piece of stored data requires disclosure notices, consent mechanisms, deletion procedures, and breach notification protocols. This system eliminates that burden entirely. Customer information travels directly from their device to your instant messaging app without touching your infrastructure. You never possess personal data to secure, so you cannot leak it. Data protection responsibility belongs to WhatsApp, Telegram, or whatever messaging platform customers choose. Your legal exposure vanishes because you simply never hold the data that regulations protect.

detail_desc.title: Instant Messaging Order Flow
detail_desc.content_html: Customers browse your product catalog, add items to their cart, and review their order exactly like any modern shopping experience. When ready to complete the purchase, they tap a button that formats their cart contents and opens their preferred messaging app with you as the recipient. The formatted message includes product names, quantities, prices, and total amount. For nearby deliveries, customers can share their location directly through the messaging app instead of manually typing street addresses. This eliminates address entry errors and makes the process seamless for local customers. You receive the order as a regular message, confirm availability and delivery time, and arrange payment through your existing business processes. The entire transaction happens through familiar, encrypted messaging that both you and your customers already trust and use daily.

detail_desc.title: Familiar Technical Foundation
detail_desc.content_html: The shopping cart uses the same secure static architecture as the Lightweight Website System. Products and pricing live in JSON files with version control. GitHub Pages hosts the catalog with Cloudflare providing DNS security, SSL, and DDoS protection. The shopping cart functionality runs entirely in the customer's browser using JavaScript, with no server side processing or database queries. When customers finalize their order, JavaScript formats the cart contents into a message and opens their messaging app. We handle complete setup including domain configuration, SSL certificates, Cloudflare Rules, and template customization. Training covers JSON product management and cart configuration so you can update inventory and pricing confidently. No technical experience required.

services.why_buy: Traditional shopping carts create massive legal headaches by storing customer data. GDPR fines reach millions of euros, data breaches destroy reputations overnight, and database maintenance never ends. This system eliminates those problems by never storing personal information. Customers send orders through WhatsApp or messaging apps they already trust, share locations instead of typing addresses, and you avoid data protection regulations entirely. We configure everything including hosting, SSL, and security. Accept orders safely without the legal liability, security burden, or compliance costs of traditional e-commerce platforms.
